section.title: Upgrade Can Fail while Creating or Removing Alarms
section.para: If you experience a failure during upgrade from &kw-hos-phrase; 3.0 to &kw-hos-version; 4.0 and the error indicates it failed while removing or creating alarm definitions, you should check that the monasca-api is working and then restart the upgrade.
Check if alarm-list works (it should output a list of alarms):
If the monasca-api is not working, then restart the monasca-api:
section.screen: cd ~/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts monasca-stop.yml --tags monasca-api ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts monasca-start.yml --tags monasca-api
section.para: Check that alarm-list works and restart the upgrade.
